definitions.definition: A summary of topics which will be covered during an academic course , or a text or lecture .
The headnote of a reported case ; the brief statement of the points of law determined prefixed to a reported case.

main_definition: ( education ) A summary of topics which will be covered during an academic course , or a text or lecture .
secondary_definitions: ( law ) The headnote of a reported case ; the brief statement of the points of law determined prefixed to a reported case.
